Package sailpoint.object

Class Workflow.Transition

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      • sailpoint.object.Workflow.Transition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject
    Enclosing class:
    Workflow
    public static class Workflow.Transition
extends AbstractXmlObject
    Represents a transition from one step to another. The transition can be conditional. Conditions are specified either as a scriptlet using the "when" property, or as a complex multi-line script using the "script" property. The default evaluation method for the when property is script: This is equivalent:
    See Also:
